attributes.action: Please urgently house The Mifsuds in the Penryn/ Falmouth
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned feel that People in serious need should receive priority social housing. This family have been moved on 3 times in 22 months due to landlords circumstance. they have 5 kids, a disabled mum, a low income, huge debts due to the high rent prices and the cost of constant moving. They have both lived in the area most of their lives, they have kids at school in mylor, penryn and falmouth. they have 7 weeks before they will be homeless. please help push them to a Band A on home choicecornwall  HR37005 and get them a secure home.
